name: generic-route-decorators
description: ES7 decorators that simplify route creation, framework independent

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:esm: rimraf dist_esm && tsc --module es2015 --outDir dist_esm -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.package: cpy dist_esm/* package.json README.md LICENSE dist/ --parents
scripts.build:package: npm run build && npm run package

author: ASDFTD (https://github.com/asdftd)
